name: Black PN; Brilliant Black BN
status: Banned in Denmark, Australia, Austria, Belgium, Canada, Finland, France, Germany, Japan, Norway, Switzerland, Sweden, USA and Norway.
foods: Used in decorations and coatings, desserts, fish paste, flavoured milk drinks, ice cream, mustard, red fruit jams, sauces, savoury snacks, soft drinks, soups and sweets.
notice: Not recommended for consumption by children. HACSG recommends to avoid it.
info: A violet/black synthetic coal tar and azo dye.
